items.title: ICICI Lombard Q2 net profit rises 18%
items.description: ICICI Lombard General Insurance saw an 18% net profit increase in Q2 FY26 despite a 1.9% dip in gross direct premium income. The insurer's combined ratio edged up to 105.1%, with a dividend of ₹6.5 per share declared. The company maintains a solvency ratio of 2.73x, exceeding regulatory requirements.
